details.title: Build Your Own Casino and Be the House
details.subtitle: Get ready to unleash your inner creativity and build your own customized casino games.Become the house and enjoy the rewards of outstanding profits.

details.title: Stake $RDT and Farm Your Casino ownership NFTs!
details.subtitle: Stake $RDT and earn casino ownership NFTs. Own and deploy your own casino products, and even customize the mechanics, token type, and UI to your liking. NFT Farming is a unique opportunity to become the house and earn income while engaging your community.
